lead_paragraph: Bristol sacked director of rugby Andy Robinson on Monday after the board "lost confidence" he would be able to keep them in the English Premiership, the league's bottom side said in a statement.

headline.print_headline: Struggling Bristol Sack Director of Rugby Robinson
headline.main: Struggling Bristol Sack Director of Rugby Robinson
